sourcesContent:
<button type="button" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary" (click)="upQuantity(phone)">+</button>
<input type="number" [(ngModel)]="phone.quantity" (keyup)="onChangeQuantity($event, phone)">
<button type="button" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary" (click)="downQuantity(phone)">-</button>
